describe: Seychelles is an archipelago of 115 islands in the Indian Ocean, off East Africa. It's known for its beaches, coral reefs, nature reserves, and rare wildlife such as giant Aldabra tortoises.

cities.name: üèù Victoria
cities.geographical_location: Located on the northeastern side of Mah√© Island, the largest island in Seychelles.
cities.climate: Tropical rainforest climate with consistently warm temperatures and high humidity year-round.
cities.famous_cuisine: Grilled fish, octopus curry, and ladob (a dessert made with bananas and sweet potatoes).

cities.name: üèù La Digue
cities.geographical_location: Situated east of Praslin and west of Felicite Island.
cities.climate: Tropical climate with warm temperatures and a wet season from November to March.
cities.famous_cuisine: Coconut curries, bat curry, and breadfruit chips.

cities.name: üèù Praslin
cities.geographical_location: Located northeast of Mah√© and southwest of La Digue.
cities.climate: Tropical climate with a mix of sunshine and rain throughout the year.
cities.famous_cuisine: Seafood dishes, palm heart salad, and shark chutney.
